vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in IexecCategoryManager.sol:
	- Version used: ['ABIEncoderV2', '^0.6.0']
	- IexecCategoryManager.sol#3 declares pragma solidity^0.6.0
	- IexecCategoryManager.sol#4 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in IexecCategoryManager.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.6.0 (IexecCategoryManager.sol#3): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function createCategory(string calldata,string calldata,uint256) external returns (uint256);
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '' of IexecCategoryManager.createCategory (IexecCategoryManager.sol#11) is not in mixedCase
